entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
